overview:
FRANCES DILLARD is vice president & general manager of online games at PlayFirst.

PlayFirst is a leading publisher in creating casual games across muli-platforms - PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, console and Facebook. Top brands include Diner DashÂ®, Dream ChroniclesÂ® and ChocolatierÂ®.

Frances is responsible for product marketing, on-line merchandising sales/account management and consumer brand experiences.

Frances has spent more than 20 years creating top-selling consumer brand experiences and driving profitable growth through technology-based innovation. Most recently with Disney Consumer Products, Fran led global strategy and business development on key brands for infants and parents. Previously, Fran served as Vice President, GM at LeapFrog with global business responsibility for a portfolio of technology-based educational products and connected platforms. She has also held senior management positions at Mattel, The Learning Company and ABC.

Frances earned an MBA from Pennsylvania State University.

relationships.title: Vice President & General Manager of Online Games
